detail_desc: Trainers in mesh with imitation leather details, a lightly padded edge and tongue, lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles and patterned soles.
Trainers in mesh with imitation leather details, a lightly padded edge and tongue, lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles and patterned soles.

Set in soft cotton jersey. Dress with a jersey bodice, V-neck, buttons down the front, flutter sleeves and skirt in a textured weave with broderie anglaise. Shorts with elastication and a decorative bow at the waist and elasticated hems. Hairband with a bow.
Trainers in mesh with lacing at the front and grosgrain loops front and back. Mesh linings and insoles and fluted soles.
Trainers in mesh with lacing at the front and grosgrain loops front and back. Mesh linings and insoles and fluted soles.

Suit trousers in a stretch weave with a hook-and-eye fastener and zip fly. Side pockets, jetted back pockets and legs with creases. Skinny Fit – a fit with slightly shorter legs that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a completely fitted silhouette.
Sandals with square toes, covered block heels and an adjustable strap with a metal buckle at one side. Imitation leather linings and insoles. Platform front 2.5 cm, heel 10 cm.
Sandals with square toes, covered block heels and an adjustable strap with a metal buckle at one side. Imitation leather linings and insoles. Platform front 2.5 cm, heel 10 cm.
Sandals with square toes, covered block heels and an adjustable strap with a metal buckle at one side. Imitation leather linings and insoles. Platform front 2.5 cm, heel 10 cm.
Trousers in washed cotton twill with a high waist that has a small, V-shaped opening at the back. Zip fly and button, side pockets, back pockets and wide, gently tapered legs.

Long-sleeved jumper in fine-knit cotton with a collar and hem detail in cotton poplin. Rounded collar with broderie anglaise and a small opening with a button at the back of the neck. Ribbing at the cuffs and hem.

Long-sleeved jumper in fine-knit cotton with a collar and hem detail in cotton poplin. Rounded collar with broderie anglaise and a small opening with a button at the back of the neck. Ribbing at the cuffs and hem.

Evening suit with a top and trousers in soft jersey. Top with a sewn-on bow tie, velvet lapels, buttons down the front and press-studs on one shoulder. Trousers with satin side stripes, side pockets and a fake welt back pocket. Elasticated waist with belt loops and a fake fly with a button.
Metal and plastic hair clips in various designs. One with sparkly glass stones, one with pearly plastic beads, one in a tortoiseshell pattern and one in a solid colour. Length approx. 7 cm.

Top in cotton jersey and a pair of dungarees in corduroy made from a cotton blend. Dungarees with a chest pocket, straps with adjustable buttoning, side pockets, a decorative back pocket, and press-studs at the crotch (except in sizes 1-4Y). Long-sleeved top with a collar and button placket.
Short, boxy top in sweatshirt fabric with a flock print. Slightly wider neckline, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Jumper in fine-knit premium cotton with a round neckline, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Short, fitted dress in woven fabric with narrow shoulder straps, a zip at the back and a seam at the waist.
Short, fitted dress in woven fabric with narrow shoulder straps, a zip at the back and a seam at the waist.
Short, fitted dress in woven fabric with narrow shoulder straps, a zip at the back and a seam at the waist.
V-neck blouse in woven fabric with a yoke with a pleat at the back, long sleeves, gently rounded cuffs with a slit and button, and a rounded hem. Longer at the back.
Imitation suede trenchcoat with a small stand-up collar, shoulder tabs and draped lapels. Loose yoke front and back, a detachable tie belt and side pockets. Unlined..
Metal hair clips in various designs. Length 5 cm.
Metal hair clips in various designs. Length 5 cm.
Metal hair clips in various designs. Length 5 cm.
Fabric scrunchies with a shimmering pattern and decorative bow.
Fabric scrunchies with a shimmering pattern and decorative bow.
Hair elastics without metal clips. Four glittery ones and two with a glittery appliqué.
Hair elastics without metal clips. Four glittery ones and two with a glittery appliqué.
Small hair elastics in ribbed jersey without metal clips.
Large hair elastics in ribbed jersey without metal clips.
Large hair elastics in ribbed jersey without metal clips.
Small hair elastics without metal clips, four of which are glittery.
Set with six metal hair clips and 20 hair elastics without metal clips. Size of hair clips 4 cm.
Set with six metal hair clips and 20 hair elastics without metal clips. Size of hair clips 4 cm.
Narrow plastic Alice bands, one of which is glittery. Two are covered in patterned satin, one with a bow on top.
Narrow plastic Alice bands, one of which is glittery. Two are covered in patterned satin, one with a bow on top.
Trousers in a patterned weave with a high waist, concealed zip in one side and straight, wide legs.
Trousers in a patterned weave with a high waist, concealed zip in one side and straight, wide legs.
Double-layered hairbands in jersey with a decorative knot detail at the front.
Boots in imitation leather with an ankle-height shaft, lacing at the front, a zip on one side and a loop at the back. Fleece linings and insoles and chunky soles.
Patterned, adjustable elastic braces with imitation leather details and metal fasteners.

Padded bomber jacket in woven fabric with a ribbed stand-up collar, zip down the front and gathered seam down the back and sleeves. Flap side pockets with a press-stud, a zipped sleeve pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Lined.

Padded bomber jacket in woven fabric with a ribbed stand-up collar, zip down the front and gathered seam down the back and sleeves. Flap side pockets with a press-stud, a zipped sleeve pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Lined.

Padded bomber jacket in woven fabric with a ribbed stand-up collar, zip down the front and gathered seam down the back and sleeves. Flap side pockets with a press-stud, a zipped sleeve pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Lined.

Padded bomber jacket in woven fabric with a ribbed stand-up collar, zip down the front and gathered seam down the back and sleeves. Flap side pockets with a press-stud, a zipped sleeve pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Lined.
5-pocket slim-fit jeans in washed, stretch, flexible denim for high comfort with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button and straight hems.
5-pocket slim-fit jeans in washed, stretch, flexible denim for high comfort with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button and straight hems.

Joggers in supersoft, washed, stretch denim with adjustable elastication and a decorative drawstring at the waist, and a fake fly with a button. Front and back pockets, flap leg pockets, and tapered legs with covered elastication at the hems.

Joggers in supersoft, washed, stretch denim with adjustable elastication and a decorative drawstring at the waist, and a fake fly with a button. Front and back pockets, flap leg pockets, and tapered legs with covered elastication at the hems.
5-pocket slim-fit jeans in washed, stretch denim with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button, and narrow hems. Soft brushed inside to help retain warmth.
5-pocket slim-fit jeans in washed, stretch denim with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button, and narrow hems. Soft brushed inside to help retain warmth.
Hi-tops in imitation leather with print motifs and appliqués. Elasticated lacing at the front, a hook and loop tab at the top and a loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles and fluted soles.
Top in soft pile with an embroidered appliqué on the front, press-stud on one shoulder and long raglan sleeves. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Short parka in cotton twill with a soft, brushed finish. Collar, concealed press-studs down the front, flap chest pockets, side pockets, a drawstring at the waist and a press-stud at the cuffs. Unlined.

Short parka in cotton twill with a soft, brushed finish. Collar, concealed press-studs down the front, flap chest pockets, side pockets, a drawstring at the waist and a press-stud at the cuffs. Unlined.
Short, fitted, off-the-shoulder dress in a fine knit with a double layer at the top and long sleeves.
Short, fitted, off-the-shoulder dress in a fine knit with a double layer at the top and long sleeves.
Thin metal chain necklaces with shell-shaped pendants. Adjustable length, 47-56 cm and 54-62 cm.
Cargo trousers in washed stretch cotton twill with a zip fly and button, side pockets and flap back and leg pockets with a concealed press-stud. Tapered legs with shaped knees and elasticated hems.
Cargo trousers in washed stretch cotton twill with a zip fly and button, side pockets and flap back and leg pockets with a concealed press-stud. Tapered legs with shaped knees and elasticated hems.
Cargo trousers in washed stretch cotton twill with a zip fly and button, side pockets and flap back and leg pockets with a concealed press-stud. Tapered legs with shaped knees and elasticated hems.
Cargo trousers in washed stretch cotton twill with a zip fly and button, side pockets and flap back and leg pockets with a concealed press-stud. Tapered legs with shaped knees and elasticated hems.
Dog jacket in a reflective weave with a hood and a hole for a leash at the back of the neck. Opening for the front legs and a hook and loop fastening underneath. Fleece lining.
Suit trousers in woven fabric with a high, elasticated waist, side pockets and straight legs with sewn-in creases. The polyester content of the trousers is recycled.
Fitted top in a soft rib knit with a V-neck, visible zip down the front and long sleeves.
Fitted, long-sleeved top in a soft rib knit. V-neck and a sewn-in wrapover at the front with a decorative tab and metal ring at one side.
Fitted, long-sleeved top in a soft rib knit. V-neck and a sewn-in wrapover at the front with a decorative tab and metal ring at one side.
Cardigan in a soft knit with a wrapover front with visible ties at one side and concealed ties at the other. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Cardigan in a soft knit with a wrapover front with visible ties at one side and concealed ties at the other. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Cardigan in a soft knit with a wrapover front with visible ties at one side and concealed ties at the other. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Cardigan in a soft knit with a wrapover front with visible ties at one side and concealed ties at the other. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Long, jumper in a hole-patterned knit with dropped shoulders and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Long, jumper in a hole-patterned knit with dropped shoulders and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Jumper in a soft rib knit containing some wool in a relaxed fit with a boat neck and long dolman sleeves.
Jumper in a soft rib knit containing some wool in a relaxed fit with a boat neck and long dolman sleeves.
Long cardigan in a soft, horizontal knit with long dolman sleeves. Stocking-stitched edge around the opening, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. No buttons.
Long cardigan in a soft, horizontal knit with long dolman sleeves. Stocking-stitched edge around the opening, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. No buttons.

STUDIO COLLECTION. Short waistcoat woven in a sturdy wool blend with notch lapels, concealed buttons down the front and cut-off sleeves with visible shoulder padding and raw edges. Chest pocket, an inner pocket, a high slit at the back and long ties at the hem. Lined.
Pyjamas in soft cotton jersey. Top with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a lace trim at the top. Short shorts with an elasticated waist and lace-trimmed hems.
